text: Bedlam is a 1946 American horror thriller movie directed by Mark Robson and was based on the 18th century painting A Rake's Progress. It stars Boris Karloff, Anna Lee, Billy House, Ian Wolfe, Glen Vernon, Jason Robards, Sr., Leyland Hodgson and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940s horror movies Category:1946 thriller movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Robson
title: Bedlam (1946 movie)
